@Kenny_Wallace Even a doctor at an NYC hospital that *is* receiving heavy COVID-19 cases remarked recently how quiet the hospital was outside the ICU because there were no visitors, fewer elective surgeries, fewer people coming in for minor issues.

@Kenny_Wallace The point is that many of these hospitals are *trying* to keep people out unless they *have* to be there. Both for the patient’s protection and for hospital resource preservation. That puts them under additional financial strain even if they have an increase in COVID-19 cases.
